text: Siwaye unn kay jo uss qom say talluq rakhtay hon jin say tumhara mohaeeda ho chuka hai ya jo tumharay pass iss halat mein aayen kay tum say jang kerney say bhi tang dil hain aur apni qom say bhi jang kerney say tang dil hain aur agar Allah Taalaa chahata to enhen tum per musallat ker deta aur woh yaqeenan tum say jang kertay pus agar yeh log tum say kinara kashi ikhtiyar ker len aur tum say laraee na keren aur tumhari janib sulah ka payghaam dalen to Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye inn per koi raah laraee ki nahi ki
